entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: A book containing explicit instructions on how to make a Horcrux. It is described as 'horrible', 'awful', and 'full of evil magic'. (Excerpt: "Secrets of the Darkest Art — it’s a horrible book, really awful, full of evil magic.")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster who removed the Horcrux instruction book from the library. (Excerpt: "I wonder when Dumbledore removed it from the library.")

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A person who may have obtained information on how to make a Horcrux from the instruction book. (Excerpt: "If he didn’t do it until he was headmaster, I bet Voldemort got all the instruction he needed from here.")

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A person who may have provided information on what would happen if you split your soul into seven. (Excerpt: "He only approached Slughorn to find out what would happen if you split your soul into seven.")

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: A person who may have already known how to make a Horcrux. (Excerpt: "Dumbledore was sure Riddle already knew how to make a Horcrux but the time he asked Slughorn about them.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A person who is discussing the information on Horcruxes. (Excerpt: "He only approached Slughorn to find out what would happen if you split your soul into seven.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who is discussing the information on Horcruxes. (Excerpt: "And the more I’ve read about them," said Hermione, "the more")
